changeSet.createView: SELECT `t2p`.`tag_id` AS `tag_id`, COUNT(`t2p`.`post_id`) AS `post_count` FROM `blogapp`.`tag2post` `t2p` GROUP BY `t2p`.`tag_id`

changeSet.author: a.sviridenko
changeSet.createView: SELECT `t`.`id` AS `id`, `t`.`name` AS `name`, ((COALESCE(COUNT(`t2p`.`post_id`), 0) / COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(`blogapp`.`t`.`post_count`) FROM `blogapp`.`tag_id_post_count` `t`), 1)) * (1 / (COALESCE((SELECT MAX(`blogapp`.`t`.`post_count`) FROM `blogapp`.`tag_id_post_count` `t`), 1) / COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(`blogapp`.`t`.`post_count`) FROM `blogapp`.`tag_id_post_count` `t`), 1)))) AS `weight` FROM (`blogapp`.`tag` `t` LEFT JOIN `blogapp`.`tag2post` `t2p` ON ((`t`.`id` = `t2p`.`tag_id`))) GROUP BY `t`.`id`

changeSet.author: a.sviridenko
changeSet.createView: SELECT `p`.`id` AS `id`, `p`.`is_active` AS `is_active`, `p`.`moderation_status` AS `moderation_status`, `p`.`time` AS `time`, `p`.`title` AS `title`, `p`.`text` AS `text`, `p`.`view_count` AS `view_count`, `p`.`moderator_id` AS `moderator_id`, `p`.`user_id` AS `user_id`, (SELECT COUNT(`c`.`id`) FROM `blogapp`.`post_comment` `c` WHERE (`c`.`post_id` = `p`.`id`)) AS `comment_count`, (SELECT COUNT(`v`.`id`) FROM `blogapp`.`post_vote` `v` WHERE ((`v`.`post_id` = `p`.`id`) AND (`v`.`value` = 1))) AS `like_count`, (SELECT COUNT(`v`.`id`) FROM `blogapp`.`post_vote` `v` WHERE ((`v`.`post_id` = `p`.`id`) AND (`v`.`value` = -(1)))) AS `dislike_count` FROM `blogapp`.`post` `p`
